nodes.text: Jidel was a member of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing who died at some point prior to Lieutenant Yrica Quell's defection from the Empire around 4 ABY. Around 5 ABY, Quell had a vision of Jidel and some other dead friends of hers from the 204th while subjected to Force energies from an observatory in the Cerberon system.
Jidel was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, the second volume of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
